title: Of Mice and Men - A story of female violence against the common man

sources.title: 1970 - Man of Violence - Where a fortune in gold bullion turns partners into predators
sources.description:
Gold, guns, and double-crosses! A mercenary's quest for fortune ignites a powder keg of betrayal.
Mercenary Moon teams up with crooked cops to snatch Â£30 million in gold from a volatile nation. But when allies turn to enemies, the heist spirals into a game of survival.

Original title: Man of Violence (1970) AKA: Moon

Uncensored version: https://youtu.be/Ww54ePbNVnc

Director: Pete Walker
Writers: Brian Comport, Pete Walker

Main Cast:
Michael Latimer - Moon (a morally ambiguous mercenary)
Luan Peters - Angel (a seductive femme fatale)
Derek Aylward - Nixon (crooked cop)
Maurice Kaufmann - Charles Grayson (crime boss)

Genre: Crime thriller/exploitation with elements of action, drama, and espionage
Release date: June 1970 (UK)
Filming locations: England and Tunisia
